member.name: T:MdFilesMerger.Controller.Abstract.ICRUDManager`2
member.summary:
Interface with base CRUD methods for manager.
Inheritance: -> ICRUDManager<T, TService>
Implementations: , , , , ,
member.typeparam: Type of CRUD service handling collection of specified models.

member.name: M:MdFilesMerger.Controller.Abstract.ICRUDManager`2.Create(System.Int32)
member.summary: Creates new entity of the appropriate model, adds it to service collection and sets as selected item.
member.param: The identifier of the connected item. If models of this type aren't connected with any other model, value of this parameter doesn't matter.
member.returns: if new entity was successfully created; otherwise .

member.name: M:MdFilesMerger.Controller.Abstract.ICRUDManager`2.Delete
member.summary: Deletes from the service's collection selected item and all elements of other models, that are connected with it.
member.returns: if selected item was successfully deleted; otherwise .

member.name: M:MdFilesMerger.Controller.Abstract.ICRUDManager`2.Delete(System.Int32)
member.summary: Deletes from the service's collection all elements connected with the item with specified identifier. Removing every element includes also removing all elements of other models that are connected with it.
member.param: The identifier of the connected item. If models of this type aren't connected with any other model, value of this parameter doesn't matter.
member.returns: if all elements was successfully deleted; otherwise .

member.summary:
Interface of manager for main directory model.
Inheritance: -> -> IMainDirectoryManager
Implementations:

member.name: P:MdFilesMerger.Controller.Abstract.IMainDirectoryManager.IgnoredFileManager
member.summary: The ignored file manager instance whose service is connected with service of this manager.

member.name: P:MdFilesMerger.Controller.Abstract.IMainDirectoryManager.SelectedFileManager
member.summary: The selected file manager instance whose service is connected with service of this manager.

member.name: M:MdFilesMerger.Controller.Abstract.IMainDirectoryManager.IgnoreFile(System.IO.FileInfo)
member.summary: Moves file from selected to ignored collection.
member.remarks: If specified file is associated with selected file object connected with selected item it is deleted from selected file service collection, converted to ignored file object and added to ignored file service collection. If there is no appropriate object in selected file service collection, nothing happens.
member.param: The file to ignore.

member.name: M:MdFilesMerger.Controller.Abstract.IMainDirectoryManager.IgnoreFile(System.IO.FileInfo,MdFilesMerger.Domain.Entity.MainDirectory)
member.summary: Moves file from selected to ignored collection.
member.remarks: If specified file is associated with selected file object connected with it is deleted from selected file service collection, converted to ignored file object and added to ignored file service collection. If there is no appropriate object in selected file service collection, nothing happens.
member.param: The file to ignore.
The main directory that file is connected with.

member.name: M:MdFilesMerger.Controller.Abstract.IMainDirectoryManager.UpdatePath
member.summary: Updates the path of selected item.
member.returns: if path was successfully updated; otherwise .

member.value: By default it is set to , before any item is selected.

member.name: T:MdFilesMerger.Controller.Abstract.IMenuActionManager
member.summary:
Interface with additional methods of manager for menu action model.
Inheritance: -> IMenuActionManager
Implementations:

member.name: M:MdFilesMerger.Controller.Abstract.IMenuActionManager.EnterOrEsc
member.summary: Asks user whether he/she wants to go back to main menu or exit the program completely. If user presses Esc "Exit" menu action is selected. If user presses Enter (or anything else, other that Esc ), "DisplayMainMenu" menu action is selected.

member.name: M:MdFilesMerger.Controller.Abstract.IMenuActionManager.GoToMainMenu
member.summary: Selects "DisplayMainMenu" menu action.

member.name: M:MdFilesMerger.Controller.Abstract.IMenuActionManager.Select
member.summary: Selects menu action.
member.remarks: Displays appropriate menu (elements of collection with value equal selected item's value. Asks user to select one element and sets it as selected item.
member.returns: Selected menu action or if user failed to select existing action.

member.name: T:MdFilesMerger.Controller.Abstract.IMergedFileManager
member.summary:
Interface with additional methods and properties of manager for merged file model.
Inheritance: -> -> IMergedFileManager
Implementations:

member.name: P:MdFilesMerger.Controller.Abstract.IMergedFileManager.MainDirectoryManager
member.summary: The main directory manager.

member.name: M:MdFilesMerger.Controller.Abstract.IMergedFileManager.Merge
member.summary: Merges appropriate files into one .md file specified by selected item.
member.remarks:
New file with specified path is created. If selected item has title set, file contains it. If created file is associated with any of the selected files connected with selected item, file is set as ignored. Next, all selected files connected with this merged file are retrieved. If selected item has table of content of type other then , then appropriate table of content is appended to file. At last content of all files associated with retrieved selected files is consecutively appended at the end of created file.
Progress of the files merging is displayed in the console.

member.name: M:MdFilesMerger.Controller.Abstract.IMergedFileManager.UpdateFileName
member.summary: Updates the filename of file associated with currently selected item.

member.name: M:MdFilesMerger.Controller.Abstract.IMergedFileManager.UpdateParentDirectory
member.summary: Updates the path of parent directory of file associated with currently selected item.

member.name: M:MdFilesMerger.Controller.Abstract.IMergedFileManager.UpdateTableOfContents(MdFilesMerger.Domain.Common.TableOfContents)
member.summary: Updates the table of contents type of selected item.
member.param: The new table of contents type.

member.name: M:MdFilesMerger.Controller.Abstract.IMergedFileManager.UpdateTitle
member.summary: Updates the title (header) of the currently selected merged file.
